# Contributing

## Getting Started

1. Clone the repository
2. Create a branch: `git checkout -b feat/your-feature`
3. Make changes
4. Push and open a PR to `develop` branch.

## Commit Messages

Follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/):

```
feat: add new feature
fix: fix bug
docs: update documentation
refactor: refactor code
test: add tests
chore: maintenance
ci: CI/CD changes
```

## Pull Requests

- Keep changes focused
- Write clear descriptions
- Ensure CI passes
- Link related issues

## Questions

- General: info@clinichat.ai
- Internal: aditya@clinichat.ai
